instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 retina board, os not loading , half way it freez, it show apple logo
threads.message:
hello, 

this board 820-3332, had water damage , fixed, had ppnush_g3h and cpu vcore ton register problem,  fixed it 


not its turning on showing apple logo, but half way loading os it freeze.... does load os, also tried with usb boot osx, same thing it stop loading half way 


any advice !!

threads.title: 820-3332 retina board, os not loading , half way it freez, it show apple logo
threads.message: Boot in verbose mode and see where it hangs.

threads.title: 820-3332 retina board, os not loading , half way it freez, it show apple logo
820-3332 retina board, os not loading , half way it freez, it show apple logo
threads.message: Probably crap under the CPU or RAM chips. Flux and some heat, do NOT reflow, just about 150C.
